content: I love the idea of a Spiced Apple Cider, especially with the cinnamon stick and cloves. I've been waking up a bit earlier these days, around 6:30 am, to enjoy the quiet morning hours before the rest of the family wakes up, and a warm cup of spiced apple cider sounds like the perfect way to start the day. Do you have any recommendations for a good brand of apple cider that would work well with these spices?
